Trade/Device Name(s): Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay for Opiates, Oxycodone and Hydrocodone
Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assays for Opiates, Oxycodone and Hydrocodone
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay for qualitative detection of opiates, oxycodone, and hydrocodone in hair using ELISA and confirmation by GC/MS.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of morphine and related opiates, oxycodone, and hydrocodone in head hair samples; provides preliminary analytical results requiring confirmation by specific chemical methods for in-house professional use only.
